question: With the transition to Virginia’s Insurance Marketplace, am I still protected by the federal No Surprises Act?
text:
With the transition to Virginias Insurance Marketplace, am I still protected by the federal No Surprises Act?
          
        

Virginia consumers who have coverage through Virginias Insurance Marketplace plans are still protected by the federal No Surprises Act.  Virginia also has balance billing laws (Va. Code
38.2-3445.01-.07
) that protect consumers.

If you have any other questions or concerns, regarding Virginias Insurance Marketplace, please reach out to our Consumer Assistance Center at 888-687-1501, and we will be happy to speak with you.
